title: Diamond Flower Bangles - Kanganalu
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (approx. 2.04 carats total weight)
VVS Clarity. Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: These contemporary bangles showcase a repeating floral motif, each flower meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds. The gold forms a graceful, undulating wave design between each floral centerpiece, adding movement and visual interest. The diamond setting ensures maximum brilliance and sparkle. The bangles feature a secure clasp closure.
colors: Warm yellow gold paired with the icy white sparkle of the diamonds.
occasions: Ideal for special occasions like weddings (vadhuvu alankarana)
or festive celebrations. These bangles also add a touch of sophisticated glamour to contemporary outfits for parties and formal events.
description: These diamond bangles offer a modern take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The timeless floral design, combined with the brilliance of the diamonds and the warmth of yellow gold, creates a piece that is both elegant and eye-catching. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and durability, making them a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, making it truly radiant.
